Quiz_Details: The Quiz is all about the Life & Works of Dr. Jose Rizal

Quiz_Questions.question:

which served as the first governmental system in the Philippines, land control was delegated to selected Spanish officials or religious orders
a form of heavy taxation paid annually by each family or single individual, symbol of vassalage to Spain
